Class MaexchenDiceRoll

java.lang.Object
MaexchenDiceRoll
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<MaexchenDiceRoll>
public class MaexchenDiceRoll extends Object implements Comparable<MaexchenDiceRoll>
This class calculates the possible dice Rolls of a normal Mäxchen game. In other words, the highest value Mäxchen (21), the pashes (11,22,33,44,55,66) and the normal values where the first digit always has to be higher die value (e.g if a 3 and a 1 is rolled the resulting MaexchenDiceRoll is 31 and not 13)
